https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fPKtatF9rTNNu9KvR363cX2JNvN.jpg After sixteen years at Her Majesty's Pleasure, Britain's hardest man is released from prison, and into the care of a documentary film crew headed by a Brit-loving American film-maker who follow him for the next week, on an hilarious roller-coaster tour of gangland London and beyond. Big Fat Gypsy Gangster
